spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room placement are high-fidelity. Most wall alignments and room adjacencies are preserved. However, there are minor discrepancies in door swing orientations and the exact sizing of the bathroom unit relative to the hallway.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent adherence. The roof is removed, no rooms are missing, there are no hallucinations, and the model is perfectly isolated on a dark neutral background without any UI or text or measurements.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is well-placed and scaling is mostly consistent. Some details such as the specific L-shape orientation of the kitchen counter vs. table were slightly simplified, and the desk in the top right bedroom was merged into a simpler unit.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect execution of the low-poly style. Flat shading, soft ambient lighting, and neutral color palette meet all criteria. Camera is correctly set to an isometric orthographic projection.

detected_errors.description: Missing small radiator details shown in the floor plan in several rooms.
The kitchen counter layout is simplified from a multi-appliance strip to a single block and Stove unit, losing the L-shaped corner cabinet found in the plan.
